trait.name: Indomitable (2/Day)
entries: Tashlyn can reroll a saving throw that she fails. She must use the new roll.

trait.name: Second Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, Tashlyn can regain 20 hit points.

trait.name: Extra Damage
entries: Tashlyn deals an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage to every hit if she has more than half her hit points remaining.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Tashlyn makes three attacks with her greatsword or her shortbow.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.
